arg.name: projectid
arg.description: The MD ID of the project being posted

arg.name: posted content
arg.description: The request body of the post as json (pairs in parenthesis are conditional): { "name" : projectname, "volumes": {mdid: volumename}, "volume2volumes": {volumeid: [volumeid, ...], ...}, "documents": [actual documentview id, ...], "volume2documents": {volumeid: [documentid], ...}, "projectVolumes": [volumeid,...] }
